title: Agentic RAG Platform (Enterprise)
subtitle: Multi-agent verification, policy guardrails, evaluation dashboards
impact: Improved retrieval quality with hybrid search
overview: End-to-end RAG platform with tool-using agents for retrieval, validation, and policy enforcement.
details_markdown:
## What I built
- Retrieval layer: hybrid search + reranking
- Agent loop: planner → tool-use → verifier

## Tech
- Python, LangGraph, Vector DB, Kubernetes
